name: Time is of the Essence (Rykuzu Studios)
name_original: Time is of the Essence (Rykuzu Studios)
description:
This game jam was created for the NOKIA 3310 JAM #3 with the optional theme: On/Off.

[Controls]:

Up, Down, Left Right Movement

W - Jump

R - restart level (Every 3 times you restart, you get sent back a level)

X - warp through walls(when the on function is activated)

Z - swap between on and off function (You can only go through the portals when you are switched to the on state)

*The longer you hold W, the longer you jump*

[Description]

You have lost your memories and your true form due to an unforseen circumstance from the Father of Time. Your goal is to get through the obstacles and defeat the boss.

The clocks are fragments of your memory that you slowly regain throughout the levels with important information that you should read and utilize.

Working with only 2 colors and a limited resolution sure was a challenge. I am extremely glad I participated in this to gain the experience of how people were so limited on space back in the days. I had fun too creating this and I hope you guys enjoy it as well!
